text: "Behind the Wheel" is a 1987 song by Depeche Mode and is the third single from their sixth studio album Music for the Masses. It went to number 21 in the United Kingdom, number 6 in Switzerland and Germany, number 16 in Ireland, number 21 in France, number 19 in Spain, number 15 in Finland and number 10 in Sweden. ==Track listings== "Behind the Wheel" was written by Martin L. Gore.
